person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Don Rieck , president of the National Animal Control Association , said aggressiveness in dogs was related more to gender than breed and a male dog that had not been neutered was three times more likely to bite than an unspayed female .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Person":

1. Don Rieck - The name of the person mentioned in the paragraph is "Don Rieck".
2. National Animal Control Association - The organization that the person mentioned in the paragraph is the president of, is identified as "National Animal Control Association".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to "Person" in the given paragraph:

1. Don Rieck - The name of the person mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Person":

| Person |
| --- |
| Don Rieck |

* unspayed female dog
